title: Computer Office Application
description: Master Microsoft Office suite including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and essential computer applications for office work
fullDescription: Learn essential computer office applications including Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and other productivity tools. This course prepares you for office-based work and administrative roles.

title: Diploma in Construction Site Supervision
description: Learn construction site management, supervision techniques, safety protocols and project coordination
fullDescription: Comprehensive training in construction site supervision covering project management, safety regulations, quality control, and team coordination for construction projects.

title: Computer Operator
description: Learn computer operations, data entry, system management and basic troubleshooting skills
fullDescription: Become a skilled computer operator with expertise in data entry, system operations, basic maintenance and office software applications.

title: Hotel Management & Chef
description: Master hotel operations, hospitality management, and professional culinary skills
fullDescription: Comprehensive training in hotel management and culinary arts covering hospitality operations, food preparation, kitchen management, and customer service excellence.

title: Food and Beverage Production
description: Learn professional food preparation, beverage making, and production management
fullDescription: Master the art of food and beverage production with professional techniques, hygiene standards, and production management skills.

title: Diploma in MIG & Arc Welding
description: Master MIG and Arc welding techniques, safety procedures, and metal fabrication skills
fullDescription: Learn professional welding techniques including MIG and Arc welding with hands-on training in metal fabrication and safety protocols.

title: Diploma in Electrician
description: Learn electrical installation, maintenance, wiring, and electrical systems troubleshooting
fullDescription: Comprehensive electrician training covering residential and commercial electrical systems, safety codes, and modern electrical technologies.

title: Diploma in Plaster
description: Master plastering techniques, wall finishing, and decorative plaster work
fullDescription: Learn professional plastering techniques for walls, ceilings, and decorative finishes with hands-on practical training.

title: Diploma in Store Keeper
description: Learn inventory management, stock control, warehouse operations and record keeping
fullDescription: Master store keeping and inventory management with skills in stock control, record keeping, and warehouse operations.

title: Diploma in Tiles Mason
description: Learn professional tile installation, pattern design, and surface preparation techniques
fullDescription: Master tile installation techniques for floors, walls, and decorative surfaces with professional finishing skills.

title: Higher Diploma in Computer Science
description: Advanced computer science covering programming, algorithms, databases and software development
fullDescription: Comprehensive higher diploma in computer science covering programming languages, algorithms, data structures, databases, and software engineering principles.

title: Diploma in Carpenter & Furniture Design
description: Learn carpentry skills, furniture making, and modern furniture design techniques
fullDescription: Master carpentry and furniture design with hands-on training in woodworking, furniture making, and modern design techniques.

title: Diploma in Welder
description: Professional welding training covering various welding techniques and metal fabrication
fullDescription: Comprehensive welding training covering multiple welding processes, metal properties, and fabrication techniques with safety certification.

title: Certificate in Operator Communication Unit (OCU)
description: Learn communication systems operation, radio communication, and technical support
fullDescription: Training in communication unit operations including radio systems, telecommunication equipment, and professional communication protocols.

title: Diploma in Driver Cum Auto Mechanics (DVR)
description: Learn professional driving and auto mechanics including vehicle maintenance and repair
fullDescription: Comprehensive training in professional driving and auto mechanics covering vehicle operation, maintenance, and repair skills.

title: Diploma in Technician
description: General technical training covering electronics, mechanics, and maintenance skills
fullDescription: Broad-based technical training covering electronics, mechanical systems, troubleshooting, and maintenance across various technical fields.

title: Motor Driving
description: Professional motor vehicle driving training with traffic rules and road safety
fullDescription: Complete motor driving course covering vehicle operation, traffic regulations, defensive driving, and road safety practices.

title: Diploma in Electronics
description: Learn electronics fundamentals, circuit design, and electronic device repair
fullDescription: Comprehensive electronics training covering circuit theory, digital electronics, microprocessors, and electronic device troubleshooting.

title: Diploma in Draftsman
description: Learn technical drawing, CAD software, and blueprint preparation for engineering projects
fullDescription: Master technical drawing and drafting skills using both manual and CAD techniques for engineering and architectural projects.

title: Diploma in 3G Welder
description: Advanced 3G position welding techniques and certification training
fullDescription: Specialized training in 3G position welding with certification preparation for vertical position welding in industrial applications.

title: Higher Diploma in Graphic Design & Freelancing
description: Advanced graphic design with freelancing business skills and portfolio development
fullDescription: Comprehensive graphic design training combined with freelancing business skills, client management, and online marketplace expertise.

title: Diploma in Construction
description: Learn construction techniques, building materials, and site management skills
fullDescription: Comprehensive construction training covering building techniques, materials, site management, and construction safety.

title: Plumbing & Pipe Fitting
description: Learn plumbing installation, pipe fitting, and water system maintenance
fullDescription: Professional plumbing and pipe fitting training covering installation, maintenance, and repair of water and drainage systems.

title: Shorthand
description: Learn shorthand writing, speed writing techniques, and transcription skills
fullDescription: Master shorthand writing techniques for fast note-taking, transcription, and professional documentation skills.
